CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains the Warm-up task to MOT . CHI bends down and touches the jack+in+the+box
MOT is not in camera view
CHI turns to watch INV leave
MOT pushes her bag out of the way
MOT gets up and walks over to CHI and sits down
CHI tries to open the lid of the jack+in+the+box and then stands up
MOT turns the handle a few more times briefly
MOT and CHI are almost completely out of camera view
MOT pushes the clown into the box
CHI pushes the lid down on the box
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box out to CHI
CHI reaches out for the jack+in+the+box . <aft> CHI watches MOT
CHI reaches over and tries to open the lid
MOT jerks back quickly and looks at CHI
MOT shakes the jack+in+the+box in front of CHI
CHI moves back from the jack+in+the+box
MOT pushes the clown into the box
CHI watches MOT and moves her hands in the air apprehensively
CHI watches MOT and moves closer to the jack+in+the+box
MOT sits back and looks at CHI
CHI looks at jack+in+the+box and then up at MOT
CHI comes over to MOT and starts to crawl into her lap
CHI turns and looks apprehensively at the jack+in+the+box
MOT puts CHI on her lap facing jack+in+the+box
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box in front of CHI
MOT puts CHI hand on the clown's head
MOT wiggles the clown about in front of CHI
CHI looks away at the toys on the floor
MOT puts the jack+in+the+box on the floor
CHI reaches out for the book on the floor
CHI picks up the picture book
CHI looks over at the jack+in+the+box
CHI holds the book and picks the car up
CHI picks up the toy duck
CHI looks at the toy car as she holds the duck
CHI puts her hand on the car
CHI turns and looks at MOT
MOT opens her hands to receive the ball
MOT looks over to where CHI points and then down at CHI
CHI looks at the opposite wall turning her back to MOT
CHI looks at the car and then up at MOT
MOT sits back and watches CHI
<aft> CHI holds the football up to MOT
MOT looks at CHI and opens her hands to receive the ball
CHI turns away from MOT slowly
MOT drops the ball into CHI's lap
CHI drops the ball and goes after it then rolls it away
CHI looks up at MOT and smiles
CHI squeezes the toy duck in her hand
CHI looks down at the duck
MOT makes a clicking sound with her teeth
CHI squeezes the toy duck in her hand
CHI looks down at the duck
MOT makes a clicking sound with her teeth
CHI looks at the book on the floor
<bef> CHI looks at MOT . CHI looks at the book and points to it
MOT starts to get up to go over to CHI
CHI leans back and looks at MOT
MOT reaches out for the book
CHI picks the book up and gives it to MOT
CHI is not really much closer to MOT
MOT holds the book up in front of CHI
MOT points to the words as she reads them out
MOT points out the words as she reads
CHI looks down on the floor and discovers the toy duck
MOT looks at CHI and shakes her head
MOT shakes her head and looks at CHI
CHI looks closely at the book
CHI holds the duck up to MOT
MOT looks at CHI and nods her head
MOT speaks in a high voice
MOT speaks in a high witch voice
CHI tries to touch the book around MOT's hand
MOT stops CHI from turning the page
MOT speaks in a deep voice
MOT speaks in a deep voice
CHI's back is to the camera
<3> MOT makes a pulling motion with her hand
CHI has her back to the camera
MOT speaks in a high voice
CHI holds the duck up in front of MOT's face
MOT holds the duck in front of CHI
MOT looks at CHI and holds the duck out to the side
CHI looks up at the duck
CHI takes the duck from MOT
CHI is restless and looks around the room
CHI looks at the book and motions to it
MOT points to the picture in the book
CHI puts the duck in MOT's face
CHI leans forward and points to the book
CHI looks up at the door

INV enters the room at 13:22:14 and explains the Small Scale Activity to MOT . INV leaves the room and re- enters at 13:28:21 to explain the Forbidden Object task to MOT . INV gives CHI the box to hold
INV takes the object out of the drawer
MOT sits next to CHI at the table
INV sets the object on the table
INV sets the object in motion
MOT looks down at CHI but does not touch her
MOT looks down at CHI but does not touch her
CHI looks at the object and smiles while clinging to MOT's leg
MOT nods and looks at CHI
MOT makes a movement of uncertainty with her hand
CHI reaches for object and then folds her hands back smiling
CHI touches a ball on the end of the object
MOT moves her hand from side to side in front of the object
MOT makes a sucking noise through her teeth
CHI looks at the object smiling
MOT looks at CHI . <aft> MOT waves her finger at CHI
INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction Boxes . INV picks up the toys from Small Scale Activity table . MOT takes CHI out of sassy seat and holds her
MOT closes the door behind INV
CHI reaches out for the activity table
MOT carries CHI over to the boxes
MOT holds the ball box up in front of CHI and shakes it
MOT puts the box on the floor
MOT looks at CHI and then kneels down on the floor
MOT puts the box and CHI on the floor
CHI stands by herself but still clings to MOT's shirt
MOT looks into the box and points into it
CHI is still looking away from MOT
MOT picks up the box and holds it up to CHI's eye level
CHI walks away from MOt and over to a chair
CHI looks down at the chair
<bef> MOT puts the box back down
MOT holds the cover of the box with her finger
CHI takes a step towards MOT
CHI looks at the ball box
MOT opens the ball box and holds it up to CHI
CHI looks into the box and then up at MOT . CHI starts to look around the room
MOT puts the box down and reaches in it
MOT takes the ball out and holds it in front of CHI
MOT hugs CHI as she holds the ball in her other hand
CHI points up to the ceiling
<aft> MOT looks at the pictures on the wall CHI pointed to
CHI looks up at the wall
<6> MOT points to the pictures . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
CHI looks at the pictures on the wall
MOT looks at CHI then at the wall
MOT points at the picture and looks at CHI
MOT looks at CHI and holds the ball in front of her
CHI looks at the ball briefly and then looks down at the floor
MOT puts CHI on the floor
CHI looks around the room and then at MOT's bag on the floor
MOT holds the ball in front of CHI
MOT drops the ball into the box
CHI looks at the ball in the box
CHI looks at the pictures on the wall and points to them
MOT puts CHI on the floor
MOT looks at her bag and reaches for it
CHI watches MOT and then holds out her arms to MOT
<bef> MOT moves her bag up on the chair . MOT puts the box away
MOT holds the box in front of CHI
MOT takes the cloth out of the box
CHI lifts her arms up to MOT
MOT holds the towel up in front of CHI
<aft> MOT unfolds the towel and hides behind it
CHI looks down at the box
CHI touches the towel and starts to pull it
MOT moves across the floor with CHI
MOT holds the towel up in front of CHI
<bef> MOT lowers the towel . MOT raises the cloth again
CHI tries to hug MOT through the towel
CHI puts her head on MOT's lap
MOT holds the baby bottle up in front of CHI
CHI pulls back from the bottle
CHI looks at the pictures on the wall and motions to them with her hand
CHI looks up by the desk
MOT puts the towel into the box and waves good+night to it
MOT puts the cover on the box
MOT puts the box back on the table
MOT takes the next box down and shakes it in front of CHI
MOT opens the box and puts it on the table
MOT puts CHI on the floor
CHI stands quietly where MOT put her
MOT puts a sheet of paper on the table
CHI watches MOT and starts to cling to her
MOT picks up a crayon and examines it
MOT holds the crayon in front of CHI
CHI reaches out for the crayon
CHI reaches out for the paper
CHI gets closer to the table
CHI comes over to the box for more crayons
CHI comes over to the box and starts to reach in
MOT puts the paper and crayons in front of CHI
CHI goes back to the other side of the table
<bef> MOT puts three crayons in front of CHI
CHI examines the crayons and paper
<bef> CHI puts all the crayons on the table
MOT moves the paper closer to CHI and draws on it
CHI picks up a crayon and starts to walk off with it
CHI holds the crayon in front of MOT
CHI looks at crayon in MOT's hand
CHI holds the crayons up in both hands and looks at MOT
MOT folds the page in half
CHI examines the crayons in her hands
MOT puts a crayon on the table top
MOT pulls CHI away from the plugs
CHI looks around and down at the floor
MOT slides the paper in front of CHI
CHI picks up and puts down the crayons
MOT takes the box down from the table
CHI takes a piece of paper out of the box
CHI takes things out of the box
MOT holds the box for CHI
MOT is out of camera view
MOT puts the paper in the box
CHI puts a piece of paper in the box and then takes them all out
CHI puts the papers on the table
MOT puts the paper into the box
CHI slides some paper along the table for MOT
MOT picks up CHI and carries her
MOT lowers CHI to the table
MOT leans close to the box
CHI puts the crayons into the box
MOT puts the paper into the box
MOT puts the box on the table
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
MOT lifts the cover of the box
MOT picks up her bag off the chair
MOT takes her bag and puts it on the floor
MOT gets up and sits in the chair
MOT points to the letters on the cover as she reads
CHI looks at the cover of the book
MOT moves the book to show CHI the hologram
CHI points to the opposite page
CHI closes the book then tries to take the book from MOT
MOT's finger is jammed into the book
CHI tries to turn the page
MOT looks down at CHI as she reads
<1-2> MOT points at the picture in the book
CHI tries to turn the page
CHI moves her head in a circle and looks all around
End of PCI - Book INV enters
CHI gets down from MOT's lap
